text: Yaqeenan aap eman walon ka sab say ziyada dushman yahudiyon aur mushrikon ko payen gay aur eman walon say sab say ziyada dosti kay qareeb aap yaqeenan unhen payen gay jo apney aap ko nasaara kehtay hain yeh iss liye kay inn mein ulama aur ibadat kay liye gosha nasheen afraad paye jatay hain aur iss waja say kay woh takabbur nahi kertay
